Row.Text: You became an Ally of [COLOR_CYAN]{1_CS}[ENDCOLOR] and you are first in queue to benefit from the knowledge, technologies, experience and informations of its citizens. Watch for the new bonuses from this City-State.

You established an Embassy in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_CS}[ENDCOLOR], therefore you gain a permanent access to the knowledge, technologies, experience and informations of its citizens. Remember that this connection is lost if you are at war with this City-State! Watch for the new bonuses from this City-State.
City-State's permanent bonuses from an Embassy!

Now [COLOR_CYAN]{1_CS}[ENDCOLOR] is under your influence, so you may benefit from the knowledge, technologies, experience and informations of its citizens. Watch for the new bonuses from this City-State.

Unfortunately, we couldn't replace [COLOR_CYAN]{1_CS}[ENDCOLOR] with any other City-State due to coding limitations we couldn't pass. If you don't want to see two cities of the same name in your game (or conflicting leaders), then we can only recommend to start the game over. Good luck!
We've managed to replace a conflicting City-State with another one. To achieve full functionality and to avoid unnecessary problems, please save your current game and reload it. Enjoy the game!
You received new [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_UnitName}[ENDCOLOR] unit from [COLOR_CYAN]{2_CS}[ENDCOLOR] as a gratitude for great cooperation and friendly attitutde.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_CS}[ENDCOLOR] has created a great work for you. [COLOR_MAGENTA]{2_GWType}[ENDCOLOR] should fill your collection in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{3_Building}[ENDCOLOR] and grant you an unusual cultural experience.

Your unit wasn't aware of [COLOR:6:82:255:255]Nihang[ENDCOLOR]'s secret weapon, small golden trident called [COLOR:6:82:255:255]Trehsool Mukh[ENDCOLOR], hidden in his turban. Unfortunately this unexpected riposte was deadly for your unit. Be more careful next time!

With new technologies discovered and new [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Building}[ENDCOLOR] built you can ensure, that your [COLOR:6:82:255:255]Nihang[ENDCOLOR] units will take part in additional training programs, that will keep them up with the changing situation on the war front. They can safely gain additional experience and be ready for upcoming combat.

Season started and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Te'aats[ENDCOLOR] from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Juyubit}[ENDCOLOR] sailed to spread culture around the world and to bring back some stuff to you. Their recent journey gave you additional {2_Food} [ICON_FOOD] Food and {3_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in [COLOR_CYAN]{4_City}[ENDCOLOR].

Your liberation efforts do not go unrewarded and [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Bogota}[ENDCOLOR] awes you! It will not spare money on you and rewards you with {2_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. What will you do with it?

You could have liberated that city, but at least you can make lives of these people easier under your rule. [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Bogota}[ENDCOLOR] wants you to continue your mission and gives you a small revenue of {2_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture to encourage you to help her unite the world in the future.

Transit through a Cape of Good Hope is very lucrative business. Part of the revenues come back to you as an additional profit. [COLOR_CYAN]{1_CapeTown}[ENDCOLOR] rewards you with {2_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold!

Travelling with the navigators from the [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Manila}[ENDCOLOR] allows you to find rare places where you can buy or sell exotic good. Your merchants send you an additional support of {2_FoodAndProduction} [ICON_FOOD] Food and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production!

[COLOR_CYAN]{1_CityOfTrade}[ENDCOLOR] finished a [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route. Desired goods from [COLOR_CYAN]{2_Colombo}[ENDCOLOR] brought you enough profits to restructure your army and increase the defense of the whole trade network.

Sailors from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Hanuabada}[ENDCOLOR] instruct you when and where to sail, to get back home as a hero! It's a death sentence for unexperienced man, but thanks to their advices, you can return safely with traded goods. Women start dancing seeing your silhouette on the horizon, granting you {2_GoldenAgePoints} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points!
[COLOR_CYAN]{1_Zurich}[ENDCOLOR] bankers found few discrepencies in your spendings and saved you {2_Interests} [ICON_GOLD] Gold in last {3_Turns} turns!

You are no longer an Ally of [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Zurich}[ENDCOLOR]. Be sure to establish an Embassy to keep working on your interests. In last {2_Turns} they managed to save you {3_Interests} [ICON_GOLD] Gold.

You are no longer an Ally of [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Zurich}[ENDCOLOR]. Be sure to establish an Embassy to keep working on your interests. Unfortunately we lost all our data about your latest savings, but we promise to keep better in the future!
[COLOR_CYAN]{1_Jerusalem}[ENDCOLOR] adopted your main Religion. Now they spread your word over the world.
In recognition and awe of your holiness, the leaders of [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Jerusalem}[ENDCOLOR] pledge their loyalty to you in the form of a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Sphere of Influence[ENDCOLOR].
In recognition and awe of your powers, the leaders of [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Sidon}[ENDCOLOR] pledge their loyalty to you in the form of a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Sphere of Influence[ENDCOLOR].

Citizens of [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Lhasa}[ENDCOLOR] awe you for your recent cunstruction efforts. They swear loyality and offer you services in return for the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Sphere of Influence[ENDCOLOR].
[COLOR_CYAN]{1_Levuka}[ENDCOLOR] grants you {2_Food} [ICON_FOOD] in each of your Cities for successful capture. They awe you.
[COLOR_CYAN]{1_Levuka}[ENDCOLOR] grants you {2_Food} [ICON_FOOD] in each of your Cities for clearing a Barbarian Camp. They are very grateful for your help.

A citizen migrated from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_YourCity}[ENDCOLOR] to [COLOR_CYAN]{2_HongKongCity}[ENDCOLOR]. [COLOR_CYAN]{3_HongKong}[ENDCOLOR] is grateful and it will not leave you without nothing. You receive {4_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold and feel a substantial warming of billateral contacts by {5_Influence} [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence.
[COLOR_CYAN]{1_Florence}[ENDCOLOR] is a home of artists and engineers, who create outstanding works each day, and night. One of them, {2_GreatPerson} decided to work for you!
[COLOR_CYAN]{1_Kyzyl}[ENDCOLOR] supports your production efforts and sends few specialists to your cities: {2_CityList}

You finished [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]{1_WorldWonder}[ENDCOLOR] - another reason to come and visit your magnificient city. [COLOR_CYAN]{2_Tyre}[ENDCOLOR] is admired and sends first visitors to check the quality and spread the information increasing your tourism income by {3_Tourism} [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism.
New World Wonder open for visitors!

[COLOR_CYAN]{1_QuebecCity}[ENDCOLOR] is full of companies experienced in logging industry. Thanks to their contacts and experience you can get more from the goods you have just acquired. [COLOR_CYAN]{2_City}[ENDCOLOR] gains additional {3_Yields} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and [ICON_GOLD] Gold from the cut {4_Feature}.

The clergy from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Prague}[ENDCOLOR] value your loss of a {2_LostUnit}, who was trying to convert pagans and infidels to your religion. To compensate this tragic event and encourage you to continue such desired missions, they support you with {3_Faith} [ICON_PEACE] Faith and {4_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.

Wise diplomats from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Singapore}[ENDCOLOR] finished their negotiations with a great success giving increasing your influence in a [COLOR_CYAN]{2_CityState}[ENDCOLOR], but it's not everything! In addition they managed to get some fundings for your upcoming projects from local sponsors. Your treasury enriches by {3_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold.

[COLOR_CYAN]{1_Sydney}[ENDCOLOR] is known from organizing huge and spectacular events. Many artists and creators arrive there to present their works to the wider audience. Because [COLOR_CYAN]{2_City}[ENDCOLOR] is about to glorify your rulings, part of these people come to your city instead, increasing the progress towards [ICON_GREAT_ARTIST] {3_GreatArtist}, [ICON_GREAT_WRITER] {4_GreatWriter} and [ICON_GREAT_MUSICIAN] {5_GreatMusician} by {6_PointsArtist}, {7_PointsWriter} and {8_PointsMusician} [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People Points respectively.

You hired a [COLOR_CYAN]{1_SwissGuard}[ENDCOLOR] from [COLOR_CYAN]{2_VaticanCity}[ENDCOLOR]. Beside its obvious military value, it can also generate something more valuable each turn - an extraordinary religious experience.

You hired a [COLOR_CYAN]{1_SwissGuard}[ENDCOLOR] from [COLOR_CYAN]{2_VaticanCity}[ENDCOLOR]. Beside its obvious military value, it can also generate something more valuable each turn - an extraordinary religious and cultural experience. God bless the [COLOR_CYAN]Radio[ENDCOLOR]!

You hired a [COLOR_CYAN]{1_SwissGuard}[ENDCOLOR] from [COLOR_CYAN]{2_VaticanCity}[ENDCOLOR]. Beside its obvious military value, it can also generate something more valuable each turn - an extraordinary religious and cultural experience, as well as increased tourism output. God bless the [COLOR_CYAN]Radio[ENDCOLOR] and all kinds of [COLOR_CYAN]Telecommunications[ENDCOLOR]!

Wise lords from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Yangcheng}[ENDCOLOR] want to celebrate Chinese New Year together and share all its perks with you. Enrich your religious rituals with additional {2_Faith} [ICON_PEACE] Faith and be grateful to your new [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]{3_Animal}[ENDCOLOR] patron, which grants you {4_BonusYields} in your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.

Recently trained {1_DiploUnit} from [COLOR_CYAN]{2_Ife}[ENDCOLOR] knows how to perform wise diplomatic actions and also can perform some magical rituals that may help in negotiations giving you {3_Faith} [ICON_PEACE] Faith.

[COLOR_CYAN]{1_Geneva}[ENDCOLOR] is a city of chances for those brave men and women, who want to change their lives. Many educated personas arrive here to help improving the city and create an ideal society. One of them, {2_GreatPerson} came here today, enriching local religious community with {3_Faith} [ICON_PEACE] Faith.

Merchants from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Genoa}[ENDCOLOR] look for every opportunity to become rich and to introduce their hometown into a golden age. Their last target, {2_GreatPerson} might help with that. Recent actions grant you additional {3_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold and {4_GoldenAge} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points.

Good time has come to you and [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Honiara}[ENDCOLOR] can see that. They are experienced fishermen, but also know what land can deliver to them, and they do not complain. They appreciate that Gods made this season rich, giving you additional {2_Food} [ICON_FOOD] Food in the [COLOR_CYAN]{3_City}[ENDCOLOR]. You should dance with these people and thank your Gods, too!

Good time has come to you and [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Honiara}[ENDCOLOR] can see that. They are experienced fishermen who appreciate that Gods made this season so abundant, giving you additional {2_Food} [ICON_FOOD] Food in the [COLOR_CYAN]{3_City}[ENDCOLOR]. You should dance with these people and thank your Gods, too!

Experienced Siida people from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Karasjohka}[ENDCOLOR] know how to find and lure [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Reindeers[ENDCOLOR] to your territory. They only need a piece of inhabitted tundra and some forest nearby to make these animals come to them without any special effort! Now you can join Siida and admire these beautiful creatures together.
Reindeers seen close to your territories!
You are so lucky! [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Karasjohka}[ENDCOLOR] managed to lure more than one herd of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Reindeers[ENDCOLOR]!

Councellors from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Ayutthaya}[ENDCOLOR] advised you to declare war. To achive all of your goals you must carefully adjust all production sectors, so they could fullfil huge demands of a war machine. Your recent planning gave you {2_Production} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in each City.
Set the production to war tempo!

[COLOR_CYAN]{1_Ayutthaya}[ENDCOLOR] knows that feeling. Being attacked by nations hungry for new territories or precious resources. Their experience gave you enough more than enough knowledge to prepare a counterplan. Thanks to that you could start a training effort to gain a new leader, that will accompany your troops to the battlefield. Your court gains {2_GreatGeneralPoints} [ICON_GREAT_GENERAL] Great General Points.

[COLOR_CYAN]{1_Longyan}[ENDCOLOR] shared their design of a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Tulou[ENDCOLOR] improvement. Its construction allowed you to increase the population capacity of [COLOR_CYAN]{2_City}[ENDCOLOR], and the effect can be seen immediately!

New era, means you can diversify your assortment. And this is what nomadic tribes like [COLOR_CYAN]{1_AlTirabin}[ENDCOLOR] pursue the most! They are experts in trade, and they will surely support your efforts to widen the caravan network crossing their desert settlements, granting you an additional [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route.

Unique techniques of using the cold fire to clear the undergrowth without destorying upper part of the forest possessed by the [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Mendyarrup}[ENDCOLOR] can significantly speed up city's growth. [COLOR_CYAN]{2_City}[ENDCOLOR] gains additional boost of {3_Food} [ICON_FOOD] Food.

New life can mobilize your forces for even better effort. Thanks to a cooperation with [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Mendyarrup}[ENDCOLOR] you know how to direct this force into your own units. [COLOR_CYAN]{2_City}[ENDCOLOR] spreads the news to {3_NumUnits} units garissoned around granting them 2 XP.
